page.title: 13LONG EATON. Shopping.
page.content: Long Eaton has a wide range,of shopping facilities for all interests. As well as Supermarkets and grocery shops ther are fashion shops, video shops with a wide range of videos available at reasonable prices. Long Eaton has several cafes , chipshops and takeaways. On Wednesdays, Fridays and Saturdays there is a local market with a wide variety os different stalls. There is a good selection of discount shops and gift stores. Car Parks have been provided for shoppers in Long Eaton. Car Parking is free and the Car Parks are very near to the shopping areas.
